name: Anti-Grav Bamboo-copter
description:
The game uses the jet hole of the jet pack to control the direction of flight, and fly toward the destination.
On the way, you need to evade a variety of different obstacles and traps.
After reaching the finish line, accept the evaluation and unlock the next level.
A total of 61 levels.

Left mouse button / left arrow: Activate jet pack jet to the left..
Right mouse button / right arrow: Activate jet pack jet to the right.
Shift: The aircraft accelerates forward.
A: Activate the switch.

Ordinary obstacles: Penalty time +0.5s after Bamboo-copter collision, body collision +5s and buckle a drop of blood.
Sawtooth Obstruction: Penalty time +5s after Bamboo-copter collision, three collisions, the game is over. Body collision, the game is over.
Laser: Whether the Bamboo-copter or the body collides, the game is over.

Pass through condition: Arrive at the finish , the time evaluation is at least one star.
